pages.title: Reaching Level 30
pages.text: Reaching Level 30 is done in the usual way, with fifteen bookshelves.

pages.title: Other Stats
pages.text: At this stage, there are a few basic options for increasing other stats.$(p)you can use Candles to increase $(arcana), Skulls to increase $(quanta), and Amethyst Clusters to increase $(rectification).
